name: DrMemory - mind images
description:
Let's test your memory power!!!!

Dr. Memory it the unique game. It will test your memory power and give you a score.
There are total 16 closed blocks and each block have some icon in behind blocks. There are total 8 unique icons so you need to find its matched icons.

Just open any block and keep remember its icon and try to find its matched icon in all blocks. If you got success to match, it will hide those blocks otherwise opened block will close again.

Choose 2 images = 1 turn

The game will count your total turns and your success match. You can also check your last 5 high scores.

Start to test your memory with help of Dr. Memory.
